title: "Unfixable" Akali got balanced faster than the reworks you guys suck off
body:
Meanwhile Gallo and Urgot going on 1-2 years still catching heavy ability changes and still being complete dumpster mode or the #1 pick of their lane depending on how riot is feeling that patch. Akali got one passover and now she's completely balanced. A starting win rate that actually makes sense for a high skill curve, clearly rewards player investment without being overbearing at the high end of play. CT knocked the design out of the park, and the balance team perfected his work.

It's time to admit you were wrong. Akali is an excellent design.

She doesn't even play like an Akali. I have never seen any Akali one shot as fast as other assassins at all. She simply can't. Her late game falls so hard simply, because her laning is powerful. I'd prefer my laning power to get toned down hard for good burst and decent late game.

but that's just my opinion

Her team fighting is dog shit. If 8.24b nerfs never happened I would actually say her team fighting would be good enough. But after 8.24b nerfs and heal removal. Her team fighting is dog shit. Katarina can AoE one shot people in quick successions with her resets and dagger placements. Talon can one shot the ADC so quick that it pretty much is BS to play against.

Akali shouldn't get dog shit treatment, because she was reworked. If people want that one "assassin" that can't burst as fast and doesn't actually play like an assassin. Then let Riot do a new champion with their own new player base. We shouldn't get shit treatment as an existing player base.

Tons of champions have high skill curves and don't ever see 25% banrate even with 50+% winrates. Akali is one of the few champions who is so badly designed that players will ban her even when she has a 46-47% winrate because they don't want her in the game.

>Akali got one passover

After being slightly nerfed multiple times and having bits and pieces of her kit removed.

But let's conveniently leave out that detail to fit a narrative.

new akali is like one of the least nerfed champion in the game

wanna know how much champions got nerfed MUCH more? Do you know that {{champion:3}}  had twice more nerfs and yet called a good rework and a good design by the boards?
Or how much nerfs {{champion:14}}  yet called good design?

Good reworks and good designs aren't tied only to how little a champion has been nerfed.

If that was the case, Warwick would be the only actually good rework, as he was nerfed ONCE.

Twice, if you count the Q dealing double damage bugfix.

Good reworks are always a combination of several factors.

Galio and Sion are good reworks because their pros massively outweigh their cons.

Akali isn't the case, as her new kit is at best unhealthy (surprise surprise, a CertainlyT champion with an unhealthy kit) and the only positive thing she's got going for her is her splash art.
akali needs a buff shes weaker then she was... she needs some more lifesteal she cant solo garen and often losses hard vs yas etc.

Akali is still a mess tbh.

You cannot lane vs her as melee (seriously not only she slows you with her Q at range but she gains like 500 ms at lvl 1 and 300 range to use her passive which has no cooldown btw) but at the same time she falls off harder than season 2 pantheon, so her laning phase top is kept in "check" by that.

Her kit plays nothing like an assassin and shes basically a bruiser with massive mobility and sustained damage, yet at the same time she has no real assassin like burst combo (unless shes like 20-0, but even a 20-0 ap janna can burst ppl down), like every other assassin has.

Her kit honestly needs to go back to the drawing board.

A good chunk of Akalis worst matchups in top are melee champions.

Power curves are not an issue; assassins are supposed to fall off. Akali does it much more gracefully than other assassins as well.

Akali is the best assassin design in the game and the rest of the class should immediately be dumpstered pending reworks to be brought to her standard.

I played her way more than you, watched guides or read them. VoDs of pro players and high elo players. She is only somewhat good or amazing if your macro play is way better than average. 

She is broken high tier since they are good at the game and Akali is a champion where if you don't make any mistakes, you auto-win your lane. Pro play is an example of why Akali is OP too. High skill cap and floor, they don't make any mistakes therefore she is complete broken tier before and still is good while begin trash soloQ unless your master+.

As I said a million times. She needs a mini rework to fix her issues as an assassin, bring her heal back in a healthy item and make her more mid viable than her top.
They "perfected" the kit by deleting large parts of it. CT produced a terrible design, and the balance team kneecapped it like they did with Ryze et al.
